titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Anilino-5-cyano-(3-(substituted)-6- (substituted))-4-methylpyridine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Anilino-5-cyano-(3-(substituted)-6- (substituted))-4-methylpyridine.
